$description: CCUI 3.0 Brand Identity Tokens for dark mode - PLACEHOLDER VALUES. Uses same brand colors as light mode, adjusted for dark backgrounds.

brand.$description: Core brand identity colors for CCUI 3.0 dark mode. These are placeholders.

primary.$description: PLACEHOLDER - Primary brand color for dark mode (lighter shade). Update when brand guidelines finalized.

secondary.$description: PLACEHOLDER - Secondary brand color for dark mode. Update when brand guidelines finalized.

accent.$description: PLACEHOLDER - Accent brand color for dark mode. Update when brand guidelines finalized.
